Configuring
Configuring / Applying custom values
Applying custom values
You can easily apply values that your Ricoh support representative provides for customizing the system, such as custom halftone names and
printer models.
To apply custom values:
1. Click the Administration tab.
2. In the left pane, click System â‡’ Update.
3. Click Browse and select the XML file that contains the custom values.
4. Select the items that you want to update.
5. Click Update.
Parent topic: Configuring
